title: Client will not log me in (Stuck at loading. . . after typing in password)
body: Started a few days ago when league was down, haven't been able to get on since. I've tried restarting my computer, uninstalling and reinstalling, and using the repair tool. I left it running on "loading" for about an hour and I was still not logged in. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: This can happen if your network is struggling to reach the authentication server, so it never has a chance to check your credentials.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
